column5: I'm considering getting an older boat.  The motor has one issue.  Prop bearing needs to be replaced.  Its an older 65 merc.  what am I'm looking at to get this fixed?  Anyone?  Thanks!
I'm thinking you mean the lower unit prop shaft bearing?  front and rear?  Why the bearing, was the prop damaged and bent the shaft?

I think I would be getting that checked out by a mechanic. What lead to the prop bearings failure? Is there any other damage inside the gear case? ( probably). Have you looked into a used lower unit for that engine?  S.
Thanks guys.  In the end I decided to pass.  It sounded like too much work.
